mapper.insert: insert into t_user_pwd (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, CARDNUMBER, PWD) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user_pwd set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, CARDNUMBER, PWD from t_user_pwd where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, CARDNUMBER, PWD from t_user_pwd
